name: Tall Tales Blanj 2
description:
Controls: 

Walk - DUH R U STOOPID 

Run - Hold C 

Jump - Z or SPACE bar 

Super Jump - Hold left and right arrow keys then jump while holding

May take some time to load

Story: After Blanj managed to solve the puzzles of the first game, he now went to destroy the evil forces in fear factory... But... Can he?
